Steps:

1. Menu Help > Software Updates > Find and Install... > Search for new features
do install;
2. New Remote Site > Name: "Spindle", URL:
"http://spindle.sourceforge.net/unstable";
3. Mark Spindle check box;
4. Click Finish;
5. On "Search Results" page, Expand Spindle > Expand "spindle_3_1_lastest" >
Check  "Spindle 3, an Eclipse plugin For Tapestry 3.1.21";
6. Click Next;
7. Accept the license;
8. Click Finish;
9. On "Feature Verification" page, click Install
